page.shortlink: grid detail images editing properties row refresh method after edits property
page.description: Defines how to refresh the Grid component after a record has been edited.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Row refresh method after edits]* defines how data in the Grid component is refreshed after data is updated, deleted, or inserted. Options include:

item.name: AutoSelect
item.description: Let Alpha Anywhere choose the refresh method.

item.name: FullPage
item.description: The slowest method. Refresh all records in the Grid when the Detail View is saved. Full page refresh is required to ensure [summary fields] and [linked content sections] are also updated.

item.name: SingleRow
item.description: Refreshes data in the edited row. Does not update [summary fields].

item.name: Minimal
item.description: Fastest method, but will not update [summary fields].
